page.title: 16SECONDARY SCHOOL
page.content: Mr. Foot started teaching in 1955,about 30 years ago.He has been in Westfield Comprehensive School. Before,it was a girl's High School and Mr. Foot taught there for 2 years. He teaches mathematics and religious education.The harder for him to teach is marginally R.E.The curriculum has changed,for example;R.E. has a much broader base,now dealing with other things besides the Bible.Maths is both traditional and modern. He lives 17 miles from the school and travels there by car.He arrives at 8:20 a.m,15 minutes earlier than he has to.He holds a Christian Union at lunchtime (1:30 p.m),and a hedge cutting session in Summer.
